channel.title: How do I select different options when fishing, like net or bait?
channel.description: I want the options let Net, to fish shrimp, and Bait to fish for another fish. Is this possible? Thanks. I have not yet scripted the code but I can if you want, it will take about 1 minute.

item.title: How do I select different options when fishing, like net or bait?
item.dc:creator: @Ploxxies Ploxxies
item.description:
@Ploxxies wrote:

Thanks, but not quite what I needed. I meant so that if the player right clicks a fishing spot, and clicks “Net”, then he will fish for Shrimp. Also if he clicks “Bait”, he will fish for Cod or Pike.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I select different options when fishing, like net or bait?

item.title: How do I select different options when fishing, like net or bait?
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

Ploxxies:

I want the options let Net, to fish shrimp, and Bait to fish for another fish. Is this possible? Thanks. I have not yet scripted the code but I can if you want, it will take about 1 minute.

It’s quite simple,

public int optionBox = 0;
optionBox = 1;
				sendQuest("Fishing", 2470);
				sendQuest("Net", 2471);
				sendQuest("Bait", 2472);
				sendQuest("Other option or delete this text", 2473);
				sendFrame164(2469);

make it so when you click the npc it brings up the above code then, add the packets 9167 9168 and 9169 in case 185: and make 9167 Net, 9168 Bait and like 9169 Rod (Of course all of these will be if optionBox equals 1)

Read full topic
item.source: How do I select different options when fishing, like net or bait?
